title: Trump Bestows Awards at State of the Union
summary: President Trump honored service members and an athlete with awards, including the Purple Heart and Medal of Honor, during his State of the Union address.
charlotte_impact: Highlights recognition of service and achievement, reflecting national values and priorities.

title: Orbán Stakes Reelection on Anti-Ukraine Message
summary: Hungary’s PM, Viktor Orbán, is focusing his reelection campaign on an anti-Ukraine message amid economic stagnation.
charlotte_impact: Illustrates how geopolitical narratives are used in domestic politics, impacting regional stability.

title: Lowe's Earnings Beat Expectations
summary: Lowe's reported over 10% sales growth in Q4, despite a slowdown in the housing market.
charlotte_impact: Indicates resilience in the home improvement sector despite broader economic challenges.

title: Stock Futures Rise Ahead of Nvidia Earnings
summary: U.S. stocks increased as concerns about AI disruption diminished, ahead of key earnings results from Nvidia.
charlotte_impact: Reflects market sentiment and anticipation surrounding tech industry performance.

title: Heart Disease Expected to Rise Among Younger Women
summary: The American Heart Association projects a significant increase in cardiovascular disease among younger women in the next 25 years.
charlotte_impact: Emphasizes the need for improved prevention and early detection strategies for women's health.

title: More Snow Forecasted for Boston
summary: Massachusetts is expecting additional snowfall shortly after the Blizzard of 2026.
charlotte_impact: Highlights ongoing weather challenges and potential disruptions in the region.

title: Botched Play Dooms Lakers Against Magic
summary: A failed final play between LeBron James and Luka Doncic led to the Lakers' loss to the Magic, 110-109.

title: Security Alert in Mexico
summary: U.S. Mission Mexico issues an update on ongoing security operations.

title: 'Project Hail Mary' Receives Positive First Reactions

title: Trump Announces New Retirement Plan

title: Democrats Divided in Response to Trump

title: Asia Stocks Rise Ahead of Nvidia
summary: Asia stocks, including Japan and S. Korea, hit record highs, with tech gains anticipated before Nvidia's report.

title: Cavs Defeat Knicks, Avoid Season Sweep

title: Russia Investigates Telegram Chief
summary: Russia has opened an investigation into the head of Telegram, alleging the app has been used for terrorism.

title: Judge Limits Search of Reporter's Devices
summary: A judge restricted the Justice Department from searching devices seized from a Washington Post reporter in a leak probe.
